doc.name: printCopies
doc.summary: Reports the number of copies that the next print job will print.

examples.example: set the printCopies to the label of button "Copies" of group "Printer Settings"

description.p: Use the printCopies property to specify a number of copies to print. This property will only have an affect if the printerFeatures contains "copies".
The printCopies property is a positive number. The default value is determined by the default setting of the current printer.
To have an effect, this property must be set before calling open printing.
